snippet.name: New Config XML
snippet.starttext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.coldboxframework.com/schema/config_2.5.0.xsd"> <Settings> <Setting name="AppName" value="$${Application name}"/> <Setting name="DebugMode" value="$${Debug Mode:true|false}" /> <Setting name="DebugPassword" value="$${Debug Password}"/> <Setting name="EventName" value="$${Event Name:event|do}"/> <Setting name="ReinitPassword" value="$${Framework Reinit Password (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="EnableDumpVar" value="$${Enable DumpVar:true|false}" /> <Setting name="EnableColdfusionLogging" value="$${Enable Coldfusion Logging:true|false}" /> <Setting name="EnableColdboxLogging" value="$${Enable Coldbox Logging:true|false}" /> <Setting name="ColdboxLogsLocation" value="$${Coldbox Logs Location (Blank if not used):logs}" /> <Setting name="DefaultEvent" value="$${Default Event Handler}"/> <Setting name="RequestStartHandler" value="$${Request Start Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="RequestEndHandler" value="$${Request End Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="ApplicationStartHandler" value="$${Application Start Handler (Blank if not used)}" /> <Setting name="OwnerEmail" value="$${Owner Email (Outgoing Account)}" /> <Setting name="EnableBugReports" value="$${Enable Bug Reports:true|false}"/> <Setting name="UDFLibraryFile" value="$${UDF Library File (Blank if not used)}" /> <Setting name="CustomErrorTemplate" value="$${Custom Error Template (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="ExceptionHandler" value="$${Exception Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="onInvalidEvent" value="$${On Invalid Event (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="MessageboxStyleOverride" value="$${Override css:false|true}"/> <Setting name="HandlersIndexAutoReload" value="$${Handlers Index Auto Reload:true|false}"/> <Setting name="ConfigAutoReload" value="$${Config Auto Reload:true|false}"/> <Setting name="HandlerCaching" value="$${Handler Caching:true|false}"/> <Setting name="MyPluginsLocation" value="$${Custom Plugins Invocation Path}" /> <Setting name="IOCFramework" value="$${IOC Framework (Blank If not Used):|coldspring|lightwire}" /> <Setting name="IOCDefinitionFile" value="$${IOC Service Definition File (Relative or Absolute if used)}" /> <Setting name="IOCObjectCaching" value="$${IOC Object Caching:true|false}"/> </Settings>
<YourSettings>
</YourSettings>
